articles.title: Ukraine's allies push for 30-day ceasefire starting Monday - NPR
articles.description: U.K. Prime Minister says Europe and the U.S. are "calling out" Putin, by proposing a 30-day unconditional ceasefire starting Monday.
articles.content: KYIV Four European leaders joined Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in Kyiv today in pressing Russian President Vladimir Putin to accept a 30-day unconditional ceasefire or face more sanctions … [+2333 chars]

articles.author: Novaya Gazeta Europe
articles.title: Fico promises Putin veto on EU Russian energy ban - Новая газета Европа
articles.description: Slovakia’s Prime Minister Robert Fico criticised the European Commission’s position on Russian energy at a meeting with Vladimir Putin on Friday evening, the Kremlin has  reported .
articles.content:
Slovakias Prime Minister Robert Fico criticised the European Commissions position on Russian energy at a meeting with Vladimir Putin on Friday evening, the Kremlin has reported.
Fico said a decision… [+1329 chars]
